Vendors Details for Request for Quotation

Dear Finance Team,

Please find the different Request for Quotation created for three different vendors with respective details.
The next stage is to get the prices from these vendors in order to move forward with the procurement process.

Please help to get the prices from all the vendors.

Thanks & Regards,
Aditya Singhania

Function findMultiplication(N())
  Dim N1
  Dim N2
  Dim Mul
 
  N1 = N(0)
  N2 = N(1)
 
   Mul = N1*N2
  WScript.StdOut.WriteLine(Mul)
  findMultiplication = Mul
end Function

value.expression: Details of the vendor selected for Purchase Requisiton No :- $PurchaseRequisitionNumber$

Hi Finance Department,

Please find the details below for the vendor which has been selected among all the different vendors based on the minimum quotation value as provided by all vendors.

RFQ - $Vendor_Selected_RFQ$
Vendor ID - $Vendor_Selected_Bidder_No$
Quantity to be deleivered - $Vendor_Selected_Quantity$
Per peice price - $Vendor_Selected_Per_Price$
Net Price - $NetPrice$

In case of any discrepancies, please reach out to our department.
The vendor is CC'ed here in this email.

In the subsequent mail, the Purchase Order for the above vendor would be generated as a next step in closing this procurement to pay process.

Thanks & Regards,
Logistic Department

value.expression:
Hi Finance Department,

Please find the details below for the vendor which has been selected among all the different vendors based on the minimum quotation value as provided by all vendors.

Purchase Order has been created for the vendor $Vendor_Selected_Bidder_No$ with respect to RFQ $Vendor_Selected_RFQ$

In case of any discrepancies, please reach out to our department.
The vendor is CC'ed here in this email.

In the subsequent mail, the Goods & Receipt Note would be created for the above vendor to dispatch the order to the specific storage
location and then the orders would be offloaded into the specified storage location point

Thanks & Regards,
Logistic Department

value.string: Goods & Receipt Note Creation in SAP
send the PO number & details alongwith pdf and grn no in mail

value.expression:
Hi Finance Department,

Please find the details below for the vendor which has been selected among all the different vendors based on the minimum quotation value as provided by all vendors.

Goods & Receipt invoice payment has been created $GRN_Number$ for the
purchase order no $Purchase_Order_Number$

All orders will be offloaded into the storage location mentioned in the Goods & Receipt Note above.

In case of any discrepancies, please reach out to our department.
The vendor is CC'ed here in this email.

Thanks & Regards,
Logistic Department
